Defect Description & Steps to reproduce: Password duoc include trong JWT Token
Steps: 1. Tao user voi password secret123 2. Goi ham generateToken(user) 3. Decode JWT token 4. Kiem tra decoded.password
IDOR - User co the thanh toan don hang cua nguoi khac
Steps: 1. User A tao don hang 2. User B goi PUT /api/orders/{orderA_id}/pay voi token cua User B
Actual Result: Response status 200 - Thanh toan thanh cong

Defect Description & Steps to reproduce: Cho phep tao don hang voi gia am (negative price)
Steps: 1. Dang nhap user 2. Goi POST /api/orders voi totalPrice = -100000
Actual Result: Response status 201 - Don hang duoc tao

Defect Description & Steps to reproduce: Cho phep thanh toan lai don hang da thanh toan
Steps: 1. Tao don hang voi isPaid = true 2. Goi PUT /api/orders/{id}/pay lan nua
Actual Result: Response status 200 - Payment bi ghi de
